1.title: Going Home
1.plot: Briar and Bramble grow tired of city life, and want to head back to their forest home. Deciding to taking a hot air balloon, they steal an abandoned one and launch themselves into the sky. But, unknown to them, Logger Vick sneaks aboard for the ride.

2.title: Back to the Forest: Part A
2.plot: As the bear brothers arrive back in their forest, they are immediately greeted by Hoo Hoo, who accidentally pokes a hole in their hot air balloon. After narrowly escaping disaster, they touchdown and are reunited with all their forest friends. However, when the bear brothers try to head home, the other animals stall them with a prolonged welcome back party.

3.title: Back to the Forest: Part B
3.plot: The bear brothers become suspicious of their prolonged welcome back party, and sneak away to rush home. Upon arrival, they learn the the other animals have turned their home-sweet-home into a fun-palace. Surprisingly, the bears are actually grateful. Meanwhile, Logger Vick finally makes it back to his cabin in the woods.

4.title: The Boss Is Back
4.plot: Logger Vick receives a phone call from Boss Lee, who informs Vick that he's out of jail, and that he blames Vick for everything that went wrong. He demands that Vick help him restart his business, and to aid him, sends Vick the self-help audio book that he used to listen to while in prison.

5.title: I'm Feline Fine!
5.plot: When a stray cat warns Logger Vick that the police are coming to arrest him for illegally poaching bears, he escapes and adopts the cat as thanks. It's the beginning of a beautiful friendship.

6.title: Vick's New Partner
6.plot: When Logger Vick takes his new feline friend home, he quickly grows tired of his endless appetite and kicks him out. But later, when the cat saves Logger Vick once again from peril, Vick decides to "officially" adopt him, and he names him Fabian.

7.title: The Black Uber-Staff
7.plot: When Bramble steals Logger Vick's new hiking staff, it becomes the object of desire for some of the forest animals when it is confused as the sacred black uber-staff of legend.

8.title: Ancient Pottery 101
8.plot: When Logger Vick learns that there might be some priceless ancient pottery artifacts buried in the area, he goes out digging. Too bad the bears have been burying their honey jars all over the forest for safe keeping.

9.title: We All Have a Bone to Pick
9.plot: When Logger Vick uses the last morsel of food in his house, a fish, to catch the bears, Bramble gets a bone stuck in his throat.

10.title: Bombing Schemes
10.plot: Mr. Lee sends Logger Vick some hi-tech bombs so that he can use them to blow up the bears' lair. Too bad Vick is no bomb expert.

11.title: The Work-Horse 9000
11.plot: Mr. Lee sent Logger Vick a high-tech helmet called the Work-Horse 9000, which supervises his work and gives a "disciplinary shock" the minute he tries slacking off.

12.title: Forest Friendly
12.plot: When Logger Vick starts to receive some pressure from his boss to meet his logging quota, so he comes up with a scheme to trick the bears into thinking he is "forest friendly" so he can log behind their back.

13.title: Turn Your Head and Cough
13.plot: Vick finally cages the bear brothers with the aid of a tranquilizer gun. But Boss Lee need a blood sample from the bears in order to gage their black-market worth.

14.title: The Real King of the Forest
14.plot: After watching a wildlife program about Siberian Tigers, Logger Vick buys a tiger costume to intimidate the animals of the forest.

15.title: The Amazing Mr. Tooraloo
15.plot: When a traveling vagabond named Mr. Tooraloo tells the animals tales of a veritable food paradise, they go on an adventure to find it. Unfortunately, Logger Vick isn't too far behind.

16.title: Natasha's Here
16.plot: When Logger Vick finds out that Briar and Bramble's love interest, Natasha, is coming to the forest for a visit, he intercepts and cages her in order to catch the bear brothers.

17.title: A Few of My Favorite Things
17.plot: Logger Vick receives a call from Mr. Lee telling him that the black-market is in need of female bears. Luckily Natasha, the bear brother's crush, is still visiting the forest.

18.title: The Sacred Cursed Stone
18.plot: As Logger Vick watches a TV program about a cursed stone that may be lost in the surrounding area, the bear brothers and Natasha overhear the program. they decide to play a prank on Vick and paint a bunch of ordinary stones to look like the cursed stone, then place them all over the forest.

19.title: The Perils of Painting
19.plot: The bear brothers bring Natasha a photo of a painter, which inspires her to start painting. But once Logger Vick finds out that she can paint, he decides to capture her and sell her to the circus.

20.title: Natasha's Birthday
20.plot: As Logger Vick is traveling to work, he happens upon the animals planning a surprise party for Natasha's birthday. But when he sees that the decorations they are using were stolen from his house, he decides to sabotage the party and get some revenge.

21.title: Beauty Over Brawn
21.plot: When two letters containing Natasha's beauty tips and Logger Vick's self-defense training accidentally get swapped, hilarity ensues.

22.title: Tonics, Ointments, and Disappointments
22.plot: When Natasha's rash ointment and Logger Vick's hair tonic accidentally get swapped, hilarity ensues.

23.title: I Don't Need a Doctor
23.plot: When Bramble sees that Hoo Hoo is getting special treatment because he is sick, Bramble decides to fake sick himself. But this plan backfires when Briar steals some medicine from Logger Vick and forces Bramble to take it.

24.title: We'll Always Have the Forest
24.plot: Logger Vick dresses up as a female bear in order to lure the bear brothers into a trap. Meanwhile, Natasha prepared to leave the forest and go back to the circus.

25.title: Mr. Inspector, Sir!
25.plot: When the bear brother's learn that Logger Vick's boss is sending over an Inspector to check Vick's work, they hijack the Inspector, dress up in his clothes, and pretend to be him and his assistant.

26.title: The Orb
26.plot: When Boss Lee gets fed up with Vick's slacking off, he sends a mechanical orb that monitors Vick's work, and also punishes him when he doesn't work hard enough.

27.title: Tiki's Bodyguard
27.plot: Desperate for food, Logger Vick tries getting a job as Tiki's bodyguard, because payment comes in the form of fruit. But to his dismay, Briar and Bramble are also applying for the position.

28.title: Hoo Hoo to the Rescue!
28.plot: After getting some not-so-reliable information from Babu about Logger Vick's new logging machine, the gang sends Hoo Hoo to investigate further. This only results in Hoo Hoo getting captured by Vick. But when the other animals go to rescue him, they get caught themselves.

29.title: Irresistible Instant Noodles
29.plot: When Logger Vick receives a box of instant noodles as his month's salary, he storms out of his cabin in anger. This gives the bears a perfect opportunity to try this new food. They instantly love it, and eat the entire box. What will Vick do now?

30.title: The Crown Showdown
30.plot: When Tiki has a dream that his crown gets stolen, he wakes up and starts accusing the other animals of treason. This sets off a chain of events that lead to an election for a new "king" of the forest.

31.title: Logger Camp
31.plot: When Vick decides to enroll in Logging Camp in order to become a better logger, the bears try their best to prevent him from going.

32.title: Vick's Not-So-Smart Phone
32.plot: When Logger Vick's phone breaks, he orders a new high-tech phone from a TV commercial. It comes with an array of apps to help him log better, which act more like the functions of a Swiss army knife, including a chainsaw that pops out of the side.

33.title: Courtesy Call
33.plot: Logger Vick's boss surprises him with a new phone in order to make his life easier. But the phone does anything but, thanks to constant calls from telemarketers and debt collectors.

34.title: Friends in Low Places
34.plot: When Boss Lee learns of yet another beating Logger Vick received from the bears, he sends Vick a box of medicine and muscle building gimmicks. However, all the box ends up doing is making him feel worse. It looks like it's up to the bear brothers to nurse him back to health.

35.title: Rocket Boots
35.plot: Logger Vick sees an advertisement for Rocket Boots, and thinks they are the perfect tool for thwarting the bears. However, since he can't afford them, he orders a cheap imitation pair. Logger Vick learns the hard way that you get what you pay for.

36.title: Anger-powered Chainsaw
36.plot: Logger Vick hasn't paid his electricity bill for quite some time. The Electric Company cuts off his power. Just as he's feeling his lowest, a flyer drops from the sky into his hands. It's an advertisement for an "Anger-Powered Generator". Is this exactly what Logger Vick needs?

37.title: Picture Perfect!
37.plot: Logger Vick receives a call from his boss requesting a few photographs of the bear brothers for some perspective poacher clients.

38.title: Battle of the Brave
38.plot: The animals of the forest are holding their annual "Forest Olympics". Logger Vick sees this as a perfect opportunity to capture each and every animal participation, so he sets up traps along the various courses.

39.title: Hercules Pills
39.plot: Boss Lee sends Logger Vick some instant strength pills called, Hercules Pills. He takes one and quickly turns into a powerhouse. He whoops on the bear brothers. Frustrated, they sneak into his house at night and steal some of the pills for themselves. Let the showdown begin!

40.title: Bear Trapping for Dummies
40.plot: When Logger Vick finds a handbook called "Bear Trapping for Dummies", he succeeds in alluring and entrapping the bear brothers and Babu. Now it's up to Tiki to rescue his captured comrades.

41.title: Splitting Hairs
41.plot: When Logger Vick wakes up to find a single hair growing on the top of his head, he becomes ecstatic. This inspires the bear brothers to play a game of "pluck the hair".

42.title: Bramble, the Mind Reader
42.plot: During a stormy night, Bramble gets hit by a thunder bolt. Suddenly, he is able to read other people's minds. Bramble uses this new super power to cheats in games, and tell other people's secrets. This causes him to lose all his friends, quickly going from super hero to super zero.

43.title: The King of Fruits
43.plot: When Tiki's cousin sends Tiki a bunch of fruit from all over the world, the gang is shocked to learn about one fruit in particular called, durian. It smells so bad that they won't even go near it. Meanwhile, Logger Vick, desperate from hunger, goes foraging for food. Will he be able to look past the smell of durian in order to feed his belly?

44.title: The Eyes of King Tiki
44.plot: When Tiki is temporarily blinded by some fruit juice, his forest buddies do their best to help him out. But he enjoys the service so much that when his vision returns, he pretends to still be blind in order to keep getting waited on.

45.title: Close Encounters of the Dumb Kind
45.plot: Logger Vick learns on a TV advertisement that there have been UFOs spotted in the area. He decides to take some photos of them in order to make a few extra bucks. But when he can't find any, he orders a toy UFO and tries taking some fake photos.

46.title: Magic Incredi-Gro
46.plot: When Briar and Bramble stumble on a magic formula that makes things grow super fast, they use this opportunity to re-grow all the logged trees in the forest.

47.title: Mummy Rampage?
47.plot: A series of accidents involving tacks and a role of bandaging tape leave Logger Vick looking like a mummy. This send all the animals of the forest into an uproar.

48.title: Fruit Samurai
48.plot: Logger Vick is caught by the bear brothers while he's playing "Fruit Samurai" on his phone. He challenges them to a real-life fruit-cutting competition, with the condition that if he wins, he gets to chop trees all day, undisturbed.

49.title: A Cure for What Ails You
49.plot: When Briar has to cancel his hot date because he has a stomachache, he sends Bramble in his place. Bramble, instead of going on the date, blows it off to try and find some medicine for his ill brother. Bur delivering it will be harder than he thought with Logger Vick getting in his way.

50.title: What's 1000 Years Between Ferns?
50.plot: Boss Lee calls Logger Vick and tells him there is a 1000 year old fern tree in the area, and that he wants Vick to chop it down. But this will be harder than it sounds with the bear brothers defending their CO2 breathing friend.

51.title: Service with a Smile
51.plot: When Tiki finds that he is about to inherit a bunch of land from a relative, he holds auditions for an upgraded servant staff.

52.title: Iron Pan Man
52.plot: When Logger Vick receives an "iron pan" in the mail that is supposed to help him with his logging, he is more than confused. That is until a scuffle with the bears causes him to press a hidden button on the pan, which turns it into a high-tech suit of armor. This enables Vick to have super powers and he dubs himself, Iron Pan Man!

53.title: The Recycled Contract
53.plot: Boss has sent Logger Vick a fake contract to sign. Vick carelessly throws the contract into the garbage bag which the bears find and dispose of. The next day, Logger Vick finds the contract gone and goes out to look for it. Tiki learns from Fabian that Logger Vick tries to recover the contract in the garbage bag because his career depends on the piece of paper. The bear brothers and Logger Vick rush to the garbage dump where they fight to get their hands on the contract. Just at that moment, the garbage truck arrives and collects all the trash. The bears and Logger ...

54.title: Milk Thief
54.plot: Logger Vick sees an advertisement in his TV of powerful milk and He orders some bottles of it. Somebody steals his milk and He thought that the bears do that. But the bears do not stolen it and the real thief was Logger Vick's cat Fabian.

55.title: The Bears' Day Off
55.plot: Logger Vick is constantly interrupted at work by the bear brothers. Briar and Bramble are worn out by the chasing and fighting so they want to take a break. Their friends offer to patrol the forest while they're on holiday. Before they actually go on duty, they have a little practice where Tiki plays the role of Logger Vick. He ends up getting beaten up by the animals. Seeing that their buddies are all quite competent for the job, Briar and Bramble begin their holiday. Before long, Logger Vick arrives with his chainsaw. The animals go individually and try to bring him...

56.title: To Good to Be True
56.plot: Briar has been giving out promises to his friends, Warren, Herbert, Tiki, and Babu. But he never kept those promises. When they remind him of the promises he made, he can't even remember making such promises to them. When Briar is racking his brain to find a way to carry out his promises, he finds Logger Vick's truck. Logger Vick is nowhere in or near the truck. To his surprise, the truck is loaded with shiny colorful gems. Briar thinks he could give these gems to make it up to his friends. Warren is quite happy after he gets the gem Briar gave to him until he learns ...

57.title: Newfangled Internet
57.plot: Logger Vick once again suffers from the two bears' harassment. This time, he turns to internet for help. Someone who calls himself 'master hunter' online offers him a trick of catching the bears. Logger Vick readily takes it. He tries to mingle himself with the bears by inviting them to dance with him. But the bears don't buy it and drive him away. Later, as suggested by the online ''master'', Logger Vick approaches the bears and tries to hypnotize them. But he fails again. Then the ''master'' suggests that Vick dress up as a female bear to approach the bear brothers....

58.title: The Value of a Diamond
58.plot: Inspired by what he saw on TV at Logger Vick's house, Tiki decides to leave the forest and his pals to pursue his dreams. Briar takes it that Tiki is leaving because Bramble irritates him, so he urges Bramble to pursuade Tiki to come back. Logger Vick sees that Tiki is wearing a shinny diamond ring on his hand. He tails after Tiki, waiting for the right moment to take it away. At night, Logger Vick tries to attack Tiki. He chases after him to the edge of a cliff, where Babu and bear brothers arrive to stop him. Logger Vick shoots at Tiki, which causes him to fall off ...

59.title: The Lost Art of Camouflage
59.plot: The bears are trying to shoo away the annoying woodpecker, when they spot Logger Vick out there chopping down trees. They drive him away by throwing fruits at him. Logger Vick finds in his place a book on camouflage skills. He is inspired by it and decides to use the skills against the bears. The bears arrive at the sound of logging. They recognize Logger Vick's disguise and once again drive him away. Logger Vick then tries a new disguise. A frog jumps into his pants which causes him to expose himself. The bears laugh at him. Angry and humiliated, he chases after the ...

60.title: When in Drought
60.plot: Logger Vick forgets to pay his water bill and is out of water in his house. But the hot summer weather, Vick can't stand a day without water, so he uses an engine to pump the lake water in his house, which leaves the animals in the forest no water to drink. Finally they find out Logger Vick has caused this drought situation. A fight over water is on.

imdb.plot outline: Boonie Bears: Forest Frenzy is stuffed to the brim with more of the freewheeling escapades that catapulted Boonie Bears and Boonie Bears or Bust to smash-hit status in Asia and beyond! Boonie Bears: Forest Frenzy Having had a taste of carnival life in town, the Bear Brothers return to the forest to start anew. But aside from the joy of meeting old friends, the bears must again cope with the dull-but-driven Logger Vick! That shiny-pated villain is determined to crush their renewed efforts to protect the forest they love. If he can dispatch the Bear Brothers, Vick will realize his evil dream of riches through total destruction of the forest. Fortunately the Brothers and their friends have a forest full of surprises in store for him! Boonie Bears: Forest Frenzy features Briar and Bramble Bear doing what they do best: creating non-stop laughs for kids around the world!
imdb.title: Boonie Bears: Forest Frenzy
plot: _Boonie Bears: Forest Frenzy_ (qv) is stuffed to the brim with more of the freewheeling escapades that catapulted Boonie Bears and Boonie Bears or Bust to smash-hit status in Asia and beyond! _Boonie Bears: Forest Frenzy_ (qv) Having had a taste of carnival life in town, the Bear Brothers return to the forest to start anew. But aside from the joy of meeting old friends, the bears must again cope with the dull-but-driven Logger Vick! That shiny-pated villain is determined to crush their renewed efforts to protect the forest they love. If he can dispatch the Bear Brothers, Vick will realize his evil dream of riches through total destruction of the forest. Fortunately the Brothers and their friends have a forest full of surprises in store for him! _Boonie Bears: Forest Frenzy_ (qv) features Briar and Bramble Bear doing what they do best: creating non-stop laughs for kids around the world!::Toni Thompson
